page.title: 18EVERYDAY LIFE
page.content: Every morning I wake up and the birds are making an awful noise in their nests. Then I get up to look at the kittens.I give them a saucer of milk, then I have breakfast. After breakfast all of our family share the house-work. At{8.15,}we get ready for school at{8.3O}.Then my brothers go to the bus stop, and I go to school with my mum who teaches there. At school,when the buses arrive, it gets noisy. When we get in to school at{9 am,}there are 24 people in my class and 56 children in the school altogether; there are three teachers. When I get home I feed the animals. On{Monday}I go to piano lessons,on{Tuesday}I go to Girl Guides and on{Wednesday}I go to Gymnastics Club. On{Thursday}and{Friday}I have a rest{!!
